SEARCH
Package Presentation

Class PresentationController

java.lang.Object
Presentation.PresentationController
public class PresentationController extends Object
The PresentationController class is responsible for managing the presentation layer of the application. It interacts with the user interface, delegates user actions to the underlying domain logic through the DomainController, and handles the initialization of the main display.

    Constructs a new PresentationController.

  • Constructor Details

    • PresentationController

      public PresentationController() throws IOException, NotContainsKey
      Constructs a new PresentationController. Initializes the DomainController and sets up the main frame for the user interface.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during initialization.
      NotContainsKey - if a required key is not found during initialization.

    • initializeDisplay

      public void initializeDisplay() throws IOException, NotContainsKey
      Initializes the main display frame, sets its properties, and sets the content pane to the MenuView.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during initialization.
      NotContainsKey - if a required key is not found during initialization.

    • getTextFromFile

      public String getTextFromFile(String path) throws IOException
      Reads the content of a text file specified by the given path.
      Parameters:
      path - The path of the text file.
      Returns:
      The content of the text file as a string.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      An array of words extracted from the text file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file.

      Returns:
      An array of frequencies corresponding to each word in the text file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the file.

    • createAlphabet

      public void createAlphabet(String name, char[] letters) throws IOException, NotContainsKey, IncorrectType, ContainsKey
      Creates a new alphabet with the specified name and letters.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the new alphabet.
      letters - an array of characters representing the letters in the alphabet.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the operation.
      NotContainsKey - if a required key is not found during the operation.
      IncorrectType - if the input types are incorrect.
      ContainsKey - if the key is already present.

    • deleteAlphabet

      public void deleteAlphabet(String name) throws IOException, NotContainsKey, AlphabetUsed, FileNotDeleted
      Deletes the alphabet with the specified name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the alphabet to be deleted.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the operation.
      NotContainsKey - if the specified key is not found.
      AlphabetUsed - if the specified key for Alphabet is used.
      FileNotDeleted - if error on deleting the file of the Alphabet.

      Returns:
      the elements of the Alphabet object with the specified name.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the operation.
      NotContainsKey - if the specified key is not found.

    • addMatrixText

      public void addMatrixText(String alphaKey, String textKey, String text) throws NotContainsKey, ContainsKey, IOException, StringNotInAlphabet, IncorrectType
      Adds a text matrix to the specified alphabet in the domain controller.
      Parameters:
      alphaKey - the key of the alphabet.
      textKey - the key of the text matrix.
      text - the text matrix to be added.
      Throws:
      NotContainsKey - if the specified key is not found.
      ContainsKey - if the specified key already exists.
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
      IncorrectType - If the specified key has an incorrect type.
      StringNotInAlphabet - If the specified word is not in the alphabet.

    • modifyKeyboard

      public void modifyKeyboard(String key, int i1, int j1, int i2, int j2) throws NotContainsKey, IOException
      Modifies the positions of characters on a specified keyboard.
      Parameters:
      key - The key associated with the keyboard.
      i1 - The row index of the first position.
      j1 - The column index of the first position.
      i2 - The row index of the second position.
      j2 - The column index of the second position.
      Throws:
      NotContainsKey - If the specified key is not found.
      IOException - If an error getting the Keyboard file.

    • addMatrixFrequencyList

      public void addMatrixFrequencyList(String alphaKey, String key, int[] frequenciesList, String[] wordsList) throws NotContainsKey, ContainsKey, IOException, IncorrectType, StringNotInAlphabet
      Adds a word frequency list matrix to the specified alphabet in the domain controller.
      Parameters:
      alphaKey - the key of the alphabet.
      key - the key of the word frequency list matrix.
      frequenciesList - an array of frequencies.
      wordsList - an array of words.
      Throws:
      NotContainsKey - if the specified key is not found.
      ContainsKey - if the specified key already exists.
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
      IncorrectType - If the specified key has an incorrect type.
      StringNotInAlphabet - If the specified word is not in the alphabet.

    • deleteTransitionMatrix

      public void deleteTransitionMatrix(String keyTrans) throws NotContainsKey, IOException, FileNotDeleted
      Deletes the specified transition matrix from the domain controller.
      Parameters:
      keyTrans - the key of the transition matrix.
      Throws:
      NotContainsKey - if the specified key is not found.
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
      FileNotDeleted - if the file cannot be deleted.

    • evaluateKeyboard

      public double evaluateKeyboard(String name, String text) throws NotContainsKey
      Evaluates the keyboard with the specified name using the given text.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the keyboard to be evaluated.
      text - the text to be evaluated using the keyboard.
      Returns:
      the evaluation result as a double.
      Throws:
      NotContainsKey - if the specified key is not found.

    • listKeyboard

      public String[] listKeyboard() throws IOException, NotContainsKey
      Retrieves an array of names representing all available keyboards in the system.
      Returns:
      an array of strings containing the names of available keyboards.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the operation.
      NotContainsKey - if a required key is not found during the operation.

    • getKeyboard

      public char[][] getKeyboard(String name) throws NotContainsKey
      Retrieves a keyboard distribution with the specified name from the domain controller.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the keyboard to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The char[][] keyboard distribution associated with the specified name.
      Throws:
      NotContainsKey - If the specified name is not found in the domain controller.

    • createKeyboard

      public void createKeyboard(String key, String transKey, String algorithm) throws IncorrectType, IOException, NotContainsKey, ContainsKey
      Creates a new keyboard with the provided parameters and adds it to the domain controller.
      Parameters:
      key - The key for the new keyboard.
      transKey - The transKey for the new keyboard.
      algorithm - The algorithm to be used by the new keyboard.
      Throws:
      IncorrectType - If an incorrect type is encountered during keyboard creation.
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during keyboard creation.
      NotContainsKey - If the domain controller does not contain the specified key.
      ContainsKey - If the domain controller already contains the specified key.

    • deleteKeyboard

      public void deleteKeyboard(String name) throws IOException, NotContainsKey, FileNotDeleted
      Deletes the keyboard with the specified name from the domain controller.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the keyboard to be deleted.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during keyboard deletion.
      NotContainsKey - If the specified name is not found in the domain controller.
      FileNotDeleted - If error on deleting the file of the Keyboard.
